story:
Playoff intensity reaches a fever pitch as the Gridiron Geeks host the Dark Magicians of Chaos in a do-or-die Week 15 matchup. Both teams enter with impressive recent performances, but the Dark Magicians hold a statistical edge, averaging 109.1 points per game compared to the Geeks' 107.2.

The single-elimination format amplifies the stakes, with the winner advancing and the loser's season ending abruptly. Dark Magicians' superior power ranking (45.6 vs. 39.6) and consistent scoring suggest they have the momentum heading into this critical playoff battle.

Projection: Dark Magicians of Chaos 113.6 - Gridiron Geeks 98.2, with the Dark Magicians advancing by 15.4 points.
